value.title: Azure Friday | Try Azure Cosmos DB for Free
value.excerpt: Kirill Gavrylyuk shows Scott Hanselman a new way to try Azure Cosmos DB free of charge, no sign-up or credit card required. It's a perfect way to get to know Azure Cosmos DB better, without commitment. For more information, see: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cosmosdb/

value.excerpt: Tommy Nguyen joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Billing in the Azure portal. value.excerpt: Nick Rycar from Chef stops by Azure Friday to chat with Donovan Brown about Habitat, a simple, flexible way to build, deploy, and manage cloud-native applications. value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
